channel.title: ::unlimited or ::special command
channel.description: hey i was wondering how to make a ::unlimited command or a ::spec command that makes you have unlimited spec for mods+ i have a 317 allstar source thanks

item.title: ::unlimited or ::special command
item.dc:creator: @demonlover14 demonlover14
item.description:
@demonlover14 wrote:

Really easy.

if(command.startsWith("spec") && playerRights >= 3){ specialAmount += 100; specAttack(); }

“spec” is the name of the command
“3” is the rights of the command, or for everyone just do this after spec" spec")) {
The "+100+ is how much you want the special to be.(You can make it 50,000 witch lasts awhile, it also will stay like that for when the person logs out or in.

To make a command to remove your special do this,

if(command.startsWith("spec") && playerRights >= 3){ specialAmount -= 100; specAttack(); }

Make the command name like, “unspec” and the 100 what every the first command is.

Read full topic
